Package Team6.services

Class PictureService

java.lang.Object
Team6.services.PictureService
public class PictureService
extends java.lang.Object
Holds details about the usage of picture.
Version:
2020.04.24
Author:
Team 6

    Adds tag to a picture.

    Creates a picture in the database with the given album ID.

  • Constructor Details

    • PictureService

      public PictureService()
      Constructor that creates an instance of PictureService, initialising the instance.

  • Method Details

    • getAllPictures

      public java.util.List<Picture> getAllPictures​(int albumId, int userId)
      Returns all the pictures from a user from the database. If the database won't connect, can't get user or album ID or execute, a SQLException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      albumId - The album ID.
      userId - The user ID.
      Returns:
      List of pictures.

    • createPicture

      public boolean createPicture​(Picture picture, int albumId)
      Creates a picture in the database with the given album ID. If the database won't connect, can't get picture or album ID, or execute, a SQLException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      picture - The picture.
      albumId - The album ID.
      Returns:
      True if picture is created.

    • deletePicture

      public boolean deletePicture​(int pictureid, int albumid)
      Delete a album from the given picture ID and album ID. If the database won't connect, can't get picture ID or album ID, or execute, a SQLException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      pictureid - The picture ID.
      albumid - The album ID.
      Returns:
      True if picture is deleted.

    • addTag

      public boolean addTag​(Picture picture, java.lang.String tag)
      Adds tag to a picture. If the database won't connect, can't get picture or tag, or execute, a SQLException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      picture - The picture.
      tag - The tag.
      Returns:
      True if tag is added.

    • getTags

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTags​(Picture picture)
      Returns list of tags belonging to the given picture. If the database won't connect, can't get picture or execute, a SQLException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      picture - The picture.
      Returns:
      All the tags as a List.

    • deleteTag

      public boolean deleteTag​(Picture picture, java.lang.String tag)
      Delete tag to a picture. If the database won't connect, can't get picture or tag, or execute, a SQLException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      picture - The picture.
      tag - The tag.
      Returns:
      True if tag is deleted.
